titleStmt.title: Absolon's IX worthies, or, A key to a late book or poem, entituled A.B. & A.C.
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700. Absalom and Achitophel.

notesStmt.note: Poem dedicated to Dryden, author of Absalom and Achitophel.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
